description: When the project does not exists in Gitlab, it will be created.

group.description: The name of the group of which this projects belongs to.

merge_requests_enabled.description: If merge requests can be made or not.

import_url.description: Git repository which will me imported into gitlab.

server_url.description: Url of Gitlab server, with protocol (http or https).

path.description: The path of the project you want to create, this will be server_url/<group>/path

issues_enabled.description: Whether you want to create issues or not.

snippets_enabled.description: If creating snippets should be available or not.

wiki_enabled.description: If an wiki for this project should be available or not.

visibility_level.description: Private. visibility_level is 0. Project access must be granted explicitly for each user.

validate_certs.description: When using https if SSL certificate needs to be verified.

public.description: If the project is public available or not.
